mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS id, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, notice_count AS noticeCount, created_date AS createdDate, modified_date AS modifiedDate FROM notice Order BY notice_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, modified_date = NOW() WHERE notice_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (notice_title, notice_content, created_date) values (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW())
